param.name: outputmode
param.label: Select ouput mode
param.description: If you selected GlossarBox Module you need to install the Modul: Glossary Description Box

param.name: show_image
param.label: Show Image
param.description: If set to yes, a small image will be displayed on generated links.

param.name: find_exact
param.label: Find exact Terms
param.description: If set to yes, the bot only searches for the exact term (means that there will be no popup generated for moonwalker if the term is moon). Otherwise, the bot will find terms which are used within other words (a box will be created for the part -moon- in moonwalker.

param.name: show_once_only
param.label: Show only first found Term
param.description: If set to yes, the bot continues with the next term, if a term was found. Otherwise it will create boxes for every time a term was found.

param.name: show_frontpage
param.label: Show on Frontpage
param.description: If set to yes, the popup boxes will also be created on frontpage.

param.name: run_default
param.label: Run default
param.description: If set to yes, the bot scans the content automaticly. You can use \{definitionbot=disable\} in your content to disable it for an article. If set to no, you have to use the command \{definitionbot=enable\} to enable the bot for an article

param.name: position
param.label: Box position
param.description: Set the postion of the box to below or above mousepointer

param.name: alignment
param.label: Box alignment
param.description: Set alignment of the box from mousepointer

param.name: offset_x
param.label: X Offset
param.description: How far away from the mousepointer the popup will show up, horizontally

param.name: offset_y
param.label: Y Offset
param.description: How far away from the mousepointer the popup will show up, vertically

param.name: show_headline
param.label: Show table header
param.description: When creating a table of used terms, you can define if the table use a header or not

param.name: headline
param.label: Text for table headline
param.description: When creating a table of used terms, you can define if the table use a headline or not

param.name: head_term
param.label: Text used for term row in table
param.description: When creating a table of used terms, you can define if the table use a header or not

param.name: head_explanation
param.label: Text used for description row in table
param.description: When creating a table of used terms, you can define if the table use a header or not

param.name: icon
param.label: Image
param.description: Image to display before a highlighted word
